venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Our next Boston BizSpark Meetup will be held on Thursday, July 14th at Microsoft NERD on the 1st floor located at One Memorial Drive in Cambridge. This is an easy eastbound walk from Kendall Square Red Line T stop. There is also free parking in front of the building and paid parking in the basement garage entrance on the west side of the building.

At 6:30 PM Mike Scopino from FreshTilledSoil will speak on what UI/UX is and what role design plays in a business' success, provide some real world examples of great UI/UX and why, AAAANNNDDDD Mike will be TAKING STARTUPS' PAGES FROM THE AUDIENCE AND FACILITATING A REVIEW OF HOW TO IMPROVE THEM!  FreshTilledSoil is widely recognized as one of the top startup web design firms in Boston.  This is a great opportunity to tap into some creative web design genius!

At 7:30 PM Matthew Witheiler, Principal with Flybridge Capital, will hear pitches from MassChallenge finalist GamesforLanguage by well-known Rubyist Pascal Rettig and another startup. 

Who wants to pitch second?

Matt currently represents Flybridge Capital Partners on the board of  Convoke Systems  and  Ready Financial  and serves as an observer on the boards of  DataXu ,  Sand 9  and a portfolio company working in stealth.  He also sits on the board of  The Capital Network  and is a Founding Executive Committee Member of  FirstGrowth Venture Network , a network of venture and angel investors supporting first and second time entrepreneurs building exciting companies in the New York area.

Please RSVP and bring guests. We're always open to suggestions for topics for experts to speak on as well.

Microsoft Cambridge will be generously providing pizza and drinks as always!

-Marsh Sutherland 
Boston BizSpark Meetup Organizer
item.name: FreshTilledSoil Seminar on Web Design | Startup pitches to Matt W. of Flybridge
